author: Play On Tabletop
description:
Tycho enters the arena with a scary Death Guard force. Garry challenges him with an army of servitors?! Can a lethal and unorthodox Grey Knights force tear down the resilient Death Guard?

Want to play King of the Colosseum at a Play On Tabletop hosted event? Check out the events listed below. Or, pick up a battle set from https://store.frontlinegaming.org/products/king-of-the-colosseum-set or for Canadians and Europe order from https://merch.playontabletop.com/collections/hats

LAS VEGAS OPEN October 2 - 5, 2025
We will have a King of the Colosseum tournament on the Sunday and more events through the weekend. Details are being worked out now.
https://www.lasvegasopen.net/

MEEPLE-A-THON November 14 - 16
Two different King of the Colosseum events on the Friday, and then Saturday and Sunday. 
https://meepleathon.com/

And, we will be coming to Europe this year at HeroFest in Switzerland! More details coming soon.

TYCHO'S Virulent Victorium
CHARACTER
Lord of Contagion - Enhancement: Da
title: Grey Knights vs Death Guard and Tycho's Dice! King of the Colosseum Battle 4
